title: tpl/tplimpl: Remove leading whitespaces produced by Youtube shortcode

body:
Hi! Coming from issue opened in my theme, there is an issue rendering `youtube` shortcode if it is nested in another shortcode in `{{% %}}` mode. `youtube` shortcode outputs a leading whitespace, which is then rendered as a blockquote.

Thanks

[![CLA assistant check](https://cla-assistant.io/pull/badge/signed)](https://cla-assistant.io/gohugoio/hugo?pullRequest=13325)
All committers have signed the CLA.
Please run `go test ./...` locally and then fix the test assertion. Thanks.

Would have seen it if I have switched to correct branch after clone 😅 
checksums pushed.

One more thing, please squash your commits with a new commit message that follows [these giudelines](https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#git-commit-message-guidelines), something like:

```text
tpl/tplimpl: Adjust whitespace handling in YouTube shortcode
```
